Question & Options:
In the movie 'Movie 43' (2013), which of the following statements about the production are true?
Options:
A. Three pairs of directors were involved in the project.
B. Charlie Wessler directed the entire movie alone.
C. Each pair of directors was responsible for one-third of the project.
D. The movie was produced by a single director.
Correct Answer: Three pairs of directors were involved in the project., Each pair of directors was responsible for one-third of the project.
